data.message:
Happy Happy Happy bday Marshall! You know that we love you .. wishing you a good health and more bdays to come We need you in our life Superman!!  keep inspiring us (all of da stans) For us, Youre the one and only rap god forever and no one can ever replace that.. NO ONE ... All of me Loves all of you slim!! Im not afraid to show onto them if how much I love you  If how much I adore you. I think I can call it the headlights of my life and thats what makes  me  feel so much better!!! And Ill loose my self if , when youre gone .. Survival?? No.Ill keep ask and asks my self if where's the real slim shady? do you know why?  because it makes me feel so empty without you. Beautiful pain strikes me again and again but I wont give a damn cos you told me that Im beautiful. Till I collapse, Ill still adore you . Yeah thats the way I am . Now, I can start the White Trash Party in da house!! #EminemBirthdayProject
#ProudToBeAStan
#ILoveSlimShadySoMuch
#TheWhiteGuyFromD12
#MarshallTurning42
#OnlyMarshallThatMathers
